title: Where can I find weather records from years past for different places in North Carolina, including Wilmington?  Is there one place where all this information could be found, or am I likely to have to go county by county to find it?
text:
Here
are a couple of places you might want to check:

State climate officer, operated by N.C. State University

www.nc-climate.ncsu.edu



National Climate Data Center, located in Asheville

http://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/oa/ncdc.html
